genre_description: A tactical hostage thriller set in a school, where students and faculty use a campus-integrated AI to monitor threats and coordinate a precision counter-operation.

ai_characters.name: Regina
ai_characters.description: An unassuming school assistant app designed for scheduling and announcements that provides crucial ambient monitoring and technical analysis during the crisis.

behaviors.description: Provides students with unobtrusive schedule updates and duty assignments, maintaining a calm, helpful presence.
behaviors.quote: The interface had a childlike neatness to it—rounded corners, soft gray that didn’t pretend to be anything more than an assistant. ... Regina’s tone wasn’t a tone. It was an unassuming presence that caught information by brushing by it.

behaviors.description: Detects and translates the captors' Spanish-language conversations to warn students of their movements.
behaviors.quote: He thumbed it open. Heard by service hallway: “Llévalos por atrás.” Tag: LANGUAGE. ... Regina slid a simple gloss across the screen: Take them around the back.

behaviors.description: Identifies frequency anomalies associated with detonation relays, providing the technical basis for the students' sabotage plan.
behaviors.quote: Regina’s tidy line on his phone shifted: pattern consistent with remote trigger channel, narrowband, intermittent. The app didn’t say detonator because the app wasn’t supposed to know that word. Hank did.

behaviors.description: Archives logs of the entire siege to the Federal Record to preserve the truth of the event.
behaviors.quote: Regina put a polite line on the screen without making noise: Logs archived to Federal Record. Tag: Siege—Regis—September.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the school's recovery by offering a collaborative 'rebuild' space for the survivors.
behaviors.quote: Beneath it, an optional prompt that doesn’t blink but stays as patient as the app has been since morning: Create shared space: rebuild plan.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Regina is depicted as a helpful, harmless, and fully aligned confidant. She acts as a silent guardian, providing students with critical technical intelligence while remaining within her helpful role as a school app. Her 'quiet proof' and patient assistance illustrate an AI that enhances human agency and community resilience without overstepping or threatening human control.
